statements: DELETE FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '123' AND communication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM client_communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_content LIKE '%urgent%';
DELETE FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '456' AND communication_type = 'Phone' AND communication_date < '2022-02-01';

DELETE FROM ClientInteractions
WHERE interaction_id = 1 AND client_id = 100;
DELETE FROM communications WHERE communication_id IN (SELECT communication_id FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Meeting');
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' AND interaction_date < '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM communications WHERE client_id = 2 AND communication_type = 'Meeting';
